front.title: American National Standard for Transformers-230 kV and Below 833 / 958 through 8333 / 10 417 kVA, Single-Phase, and 750 / 862 through 60 000 / 80 000 / 100 000 kVA, Three-Phase Without Load Tap Changing; and 3750 / 4687 through 60 000 / 80 000 / 100 000 kVA with Load Tap Changing-Safety Requirement
front.abstract: This IEEE Standards product is part of the C57 Family on Power Distribution and Regulating Transformers.
